title: How are new vaccines developed? Here is the complete process
author: Divya Rajagopal
description: What do different phases of a trial test?Phase 1 and 2 test safety and immune response. Safety is one of the most important factors in a vaccine trial, as it is meant to be administered to healthy, not sick, populations.
